Package ui

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IUserInterface  
    IUserInterface.TabbedPaneActivator  
    NodeSelectionListener
    Listener for selection of nodes by any UI component.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GLCamManager
    Handle all camera motion including smooth motions, click-to-coordinate mapping, etc.
    GLPanelGeneric
    This attempts to hold all the things I normally do when making a new panel that uses GL.
    PanelHistogram  
    PanelHistogram_LeafDepth  
    PanelPie  
    PanelPie_ViableFutures  
    PanelPlot  
    PanelPlot_Controls  
    PanelPlot_Simple
    Simple plotter for adding one or more xy data series and plotting them on a single axis.
    PanelPlot_SingleRun
    This plotter makes plots from all the states along a single run, not just at the nodes.
    PanelPlot_States
    Pane for displaying plots of various state variables.
    PanelPlot_Transformed  
    PanelRunner
    Snapshot viewers of the runner and animations of the runner share a lot of features and dimensions.
    PanelRunner_Animated  
    PanelRunner_AnimatedFromStates  
    PanelRunner_AnimatedTransformed
    For running animations of the QWOP runner side-by-side with compressed then decompressed versions of those states.
    PanelRunner_Comparison  
    PanelRunner_MultiState
    An slightly more fully-featured version of PanelRunner_SimpleState.
    PanelRunner_SimpleState
    Simple runner visualizer that either takes a node and gets its state or takes a state directly and displays it.
    PanelRunner_Snapshot
    Displays fixed shots of the runner at selected nodes.
    PanelTimeSeries  
    PanelTimeSeries_WorkerLoad  
    PanelTree
    Pane for displaying the entire tree in OpenGL.
    ScreenCapture
    Video capture and saving.
    StandaloneRunnerDrawer
    Draw a runner at a given state.
    UI_Full
    All UI stuff happens here and most of the analysis that individual panes show happens here too.
    UI_Headless
